00037     def _connect(self,host=None,user=None,password=None,database=None):
00038         if user == None and password == None and database == None:
00039             dsn = host
00040         else:
00041             dsn = 'host='+self.addq(host)
00042             if (user != None): dsn += ' user='+self.addq(user)
00043             if (password != None): dsn += ' password='+self.addq(password)
00044             if (database != None): dsn += ' dbname='+self.addq(database)
00045         
00046         self._conn = psycopg.connect(dsn)
00047         self._conn.autocommit(1)

00072     def _blobencode(self,blob):
00073         blob = str(blob)
00074         #92=backslash, 0=null, 39=single-quote
00075         return blob.replace(chr(92),r'\\134').replace(chr(0),r'\\000').replace(chr(39),r'\\047')

00077     def UpdateBlob(self,table,field,blob,where,blobtype='BLOB'):
00078         if (blobtype == 'BLOB'):
00079             self.Execute("update %s set %s='%s' WHERE %s" % (table,field,self._blobencode(blob),where))
00080         else:
00081             self.Execute("update %s set %s='%s' WHERE %s" % (table,field,self.addq(blob),where))
